answers.answer: Hang in there. I wish I could think of just ONE person that said this was gonna be easy. But I can't. I'm have gained SO MUCH weight all over my body. I can set a cup on my ***. My back, legs, and feet are totally done with this pregnancy. I was induced also with my first with pre eclampcia at 35 weeks. And am PRAYING for a Christmas baby with this little guy. I have a sinus infection and feel like a super wimp now reading all you're going through. So keep up the positive thoughts and hopefully with holiday season it'll go by quickly for you and your bump! You're doing awesome.
Thanks!! Funny i am sick also....i am telling ya i am finished
We are so close. Whenever you're having a bad day try to focus on lo. It'll all be over soon and when you get to see that precious little face you'll forget about all the pain.

I know your right Willintowin but i am just emotionally drained in every sense of the word from the way i feel to the events that took place last week. I didnt say anything but my 4yr old was diagnosed with Lyme Disease so he is on meds for that then friday i was hit almost head on by a maniac driver in a utility van. I slammed on my horn he swerved around me and side swiped my new suv my husband just bought me 2 months ago..it was a hit and run he was so going so fast no one could get the plate #  were all ok but i am just dealing with a lot on top of holiday stress and not feeling good. My eye is on the prize i am excited for my baby girl to get here though i am just over it now
Thanks diana!!! I appreciate your support always. I am praying the same...i cant wait to get on with this

Never made a long term choice on a bad day (or hour or week). Yes the last stretch *****. But we are providing our babies the best environment to finish their last big developments. When it is rough, I try to think of the micro premies, and premies. Their parents are going through so much more than how my body feels now. It doesn't help with the physical side, but perspective helps with how we can frame our thoughts.
All I can say is I totally understand! 6 weeks left and I'm just hoping she comes in the next 3!!
I have 45 days left and I have pressure there as well. I can't walk. It hurts.  My doctor said the same.. what works for me is sitting and laying down.  I try to relax as much as I can
I have 45 days left and I have pressure there as well. I can't walk. It hurts.  My doctor said the same.. what works for me is sitting and laying down.  I try to relax as much as I can

question: I am so done today!! 48days left and i am done now! My legs hurt the sciatica is awful my back hurts my *** hurts the pressure on my lady bits is dreadful and i can barely walk. The pressure is so bad the area near where the baby comes out is all swollen and soft. The doctor said its the pressure from her head! I cant...my 1st pregnancy wasnt this bad at the end other then i had to be induced for the preeclampsia thats it. I have a feeling my baby girl is a little chunka munka and thats why my private feels like its gonna hit the floor. I am so tired also.
title: RANT-SO OVER THIS!!
